title: Installation Issue
ques:
Hi,

I am unable to install from msi (Design Pattern Framework 4.0 CS.msi). 
It is showing: could not access network location \sw620_fagarwalsDoFactory Patterns 4.0. CS.
I tried with setup.exe too.

Could you please help me to install.

Regards,
Suresh

answers.ans:
Suresh: 

I am sorry for the trouble. We've had a few other users with the same issue. It has been discussed in this thread: 
http://www.dofactory.com/topic/1134/how-do-you-change-the-default-installation-folder-for-the-c-version-of-dp.aspx.  

To the best of our knowledge, the error is caused by a registry mis-configuration on your box. 
Even Microsoft's own products (like Office) cannot be installed when this occurs. 

Microsoft offers a 'FixIt' utility that you may want to try. 
You'll find it here. http://support.microsoft.com/kb/886549

Hope this helps.
